dcterms:description: The Universal Dependencies datasets are used for training and development in the shallow track of the 2019 NLG Surface Realization Shared Task. The datasets contain unordered and lemmatized tokens with universal dependency structures for various languages, including English.
dcterms:title: Universal Dependencies Dataset
